review: As a Prime member got this for $19.  What a bargain!  Easy to install on TV.  Easy on-screen set up.  Remote has good controls.  Zillions of amazon Prime free TV shows and films.  With amazon app, a nice way to store and view photos.  Use it much more now than the Apple TV.

review: We are very pleased with Firestick. Previously, we had used our Samsung blue ray DVD player to stream Netflix through and were not able to get closed caption or Amazon Prime movies. With the Firestick we are able to stream movies from Netflix, Prime, and numerous others. The best thing of all, is that they all have closed caption now. Being hearing impaired,  this is a huge plus for me!
